stories.Title: Safety is a priority
stories.Description: Tesla is addressing the reports from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, recalling over two million vehicles to enhance Autopilot safety through a free over-the-air software update.
stories.Tweet: Safety is a priority 📦 Tesla is addressing the reports from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, recalling over two million vehicles to enhance Autopilot safety through a free over-the-air software update. #tesla https://www.teslarati.com/tesla-nhtsa-2-million-vehicle-autopilot-recall-ota-update/

stories.Title: Waiting in line?
stories.Description: SpaceX's January timeline faces potential adjustments due to recent delays in the launch of the U.S. Space Force's X-37B spaceplane. Multiple missions might have to wait a bit longer to take flight.
stories.Tweet: Waiting in line? 📦 SpaceX's January timeline faces potential adjustments due to recent delays in the launch of the U.S. Space Force's X-37B spaceplane. Multiple missions might have to wait a bit longer to take flight. #spacex https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/12/technical-problems-ground-spacex-launch-of-us-military-spaceplane/

stories.Title: Even more connectivity
stories.Description: Amazon's Project Kuiper moves forward! Recent inter-satellite link tests between KuiperSat-1 and KuiperSat-2 confirmed the project's success, paving the way for a broadband network launch next year.
stories.Tweet: Even more connectivity 📦 Amazon's Project Kuiper moves forward! Recent inter-satellite link tests between KuiperSat-1 and KuiperSat-2 confirmed the project's success, paving the way for a broadband network launch next year. #amazon https://spacenews.com/project-kuiper-prototypes-successfully-test-inter-satellite-optical-links/

stories.Title: The old-fashioned way
stories.Description: Time's passage brings challenges for Voyager 1, NASA's 46-year-old space probe. Currently, a glitch is disrupting its communication with Earth, forcing engineers to rely on old manuals for help.
stories.Tweet: The old-fashioned way  📦 Time's passage brings challenges for Voyager 1, NASA's 46-year-old space probe. Currently, a glitch is disrupting its communication with Earth, forcing engineers to rely on old manuals for help. #spacex https://gizmodo.com/nasas-voyager-1-spacecraft-is-speaking-gibberish-1851096904

stories.Title: Rocket Lab is back
stories.Description: After a setback in its last launch resulting in the loss of Capella Space's satellites, the Electron rocket is ready for liftoff tonight. Stay tuned for live coverage!
stories.Tweet: Rocket Lab is back 📦 After a setback in its last launch resulting in the loss of Capella Space's satellites, the Electron rocket is ready for liftoff tonight. Stay tuned for live coverage! #space https://www.space.com/rocket-lab-return-to-flight-moon-god-awakens-launch

stories.Title: Intel takes the lead
stories.Description: Intel has unveiled the Core Ultra CPUs at its AI Everywhere event. With improved power efficiency and performance, these processors can handle AI tasks seamlessly, outshining competitors.
stories.Tweet: Intel takes the lead 📦 Intel has unveiled the Core Ultra CPUs at its AI Everywhere event. With improved power efficiency and performance, these processors can handle AI tasks seamlessly, outshining competitors. #intel https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/14/23998215/intel-core-ultra-cpu-specs-availability

stories.Title: Bye-bye, Discord!
stories.Description: Midjourney, the acclaimed image-generating AI service, is slowly making its way out of Discord. Users with over 10,000 creations are now able to test an "alpha" version directly on their website.
stories.Tweet: Bye-bye, Discord! 📦 Midjourney, the acclaimed image-generating AI service, is slowly making its way out of Discord. Users with over 10,000 creations are now able to test an "alpha" version directly on their website. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/midjourney-alpha-is-here-with-ai-image-generations-on-the-web/

stories.Title: From text to tunes
stories.Description: Directly from its AI Test Kitchen, Google has released MusicFX—an experimental tool aimed at musicians, producers, and creative minds, that lets them create music through the use of AI.
stories.Tweet: From text to tunes 📦 Directly from its AI Test Kitchen, Google has released MusicFX—an experimental tool aimed at musicians, producers, and creative minds, that lets them create music through the use of AI. #google https://venturebeat.com/ai/googles-new-ai-tool-musicfx-composes-music-with-just-a-few-words/

stories.Title: A cosmic show
stories.Description: Don't forget to look at the sky tonight as the Geminid meteor shower reaches its peak once again. Make sure to avoid bright places and bring a blanket outside to watch the spectacle (or tune in live.)
stories.Tweet: A cosmic show 📦 Don't forget to look at the sky tonight as the Geminid meteor shower reaches its peak once again. Make sure to avoid bright places and bring a blanket outside to watch the spectacle (or tune in live.) #space https://www.space.com/geminid-meteor-shower-webcasts-dec-2023

stories.Title: At the end of the cookies
stories.Description: As part of Google's Privacy Sandbox project, which brings innovative tools to replace old tracking methods for enhanced privacy, 30 million users will say goodbye to cookies on January 4th.
stories.Tweet: At the end of the cookies 📦 As part of Google's Privacy Sandbox project, which brings innovative tools to replace old tracking methods for enhanced privacy, 30 million users will say goodbye to cookies on January 4th. #google https://gizmodo.com/google-chrome-cookie-privacy-sandbox-launch-date-jan-4-1851098807

title: Tesla's recall alert, Voyager 1 faces glitch, Google goes cookie-free
description: Tesla prioritizes user safety with the swift release of an over-the-air update addressing specific autopilot issues. NASA's Voyager 1 is sending out nonsense due to a glitch, and engineers are scratching their heads, flipping through vintage manuals to crack the code. Lastly, on January 4, you'll see Google saying: "No more cookies for you!" to enhance privacy by introducing new tracking techniques.
